post.body: ...never heard of the virus...but another reason why I use a mac...sorry...
..talk to me..what do you want to tell me...I'm listening...though I should be sleeping right now...
....excellent....
...has to be the same guy...it's too similar in the crazy department....
...yes, I follow @chrisbrogan ...I'll check with him....thanks for the idea....
...thanks...I'll check it out...
...I am working on the manual to help new Twitter users understand how it all works...#TCOT...give me some time on it....
...where in South Jersey? I grew up in Middletown...lived a few years between Belmar and Bradley Beach after college...
...way to go @maximuspolitics!
... @joshpaul had good things to say, so here I am, too....
..glad to have you here...it's a crazy story...just another to add to the memory bank...
..I'll send you the email...let me know if you think I am on the right track....DM me your email...
...and he threatened me...over being blocked on Facebook...sorry, that is crazy...
...a #TCOT How To Manual, so to speak....
I sent @lindaackerman a detailed email about followers today. Perhaps I'll do some more on DM's, etc, and we can distribute
...we haven't spoken in 20 years...and I'm not interested in picking it back up...should I be dishonest and call him "friend"?
...@joshpaul can not be president...he'd make the official language of the US "java"...and we can't have that....
....Mmmmmmm....roasted caramel nut tart.....
...I appreciate you asking...thanks...
...not being a goof...#TCOT stands for http://topconservativesontwitter.org ...long overdue, and very cool....
...this is really good stuff..some very passionate people who are very driven...#TCOT is a great creation....
...welcome to Twitter! Now, instead of quoting michellemalkin.com, I can say, RT from @michellemalkin ...excellent....
...good to have you on Twitter...now explain how someone in MD has a Chargers football helmet avatar? How can you do that?
...technology good.....
...the law is a mystery, @brooksbayne ...a deep deep mystery....
is trying to explain some code to me....just when I think I've advanced, I realize that I haven't...
...fantastic...just make sure the pilot keeps his or her eyes on the skies....
..now following you because @stormbringer005 said I should...and when Bob speaks, I listen...so welcome! and let's talk...
...I appreciate it...this photo shows my sensitive side.....
...great! be sure to give @michaelpleahy a tweet...he'll help you help us help others...thanks for reaching out...
...its good...very memorable...
..glad to have you at #TCOT...how can I help you learn the ropes?
...and here are more things that a Pres. Obama will do for all of us.. http://obamawill.com/ ...happy happy times....
...I'm signed up...prepared to be a mentor...by the by, you are doing incredible work with the site...thanks for that... #TCOT
...we should talk...I'd like to learn more about what you do with jenesy and miicc...in reference to adgrinder.com and other
...seeds of renewal regarding what?
I try to pay no attention to Mayor Nagin of New Orleans..he is a not a good mayor, and not a good person based on statements
...and where in south Florida are you?
..yes, we do have a great ad solution for small biz, or those who want to monetize their content..let's talk about it sometime
but he lost the vote...sometimes, you needs to just be happy for the victory...your point, I think, is that more needs to be done.
how can #TCOT help you get better at Twitter? Just reply with your questions..include #TCOT in the reply..we're here for you
...interesting...I'll check into it..
...there is always a what-if...I'm talking about in the main...not sharing with your children is just wrong...
...will that allow for a live call?
...that is a good idea...I'll look into that now...thanks....
...have you used talkshoe before?
excellent...I'll take the lead for putting together a #TCOT LA meetup...perhaps 1st or 2nd week in January due to holidays
...thanks...I got a lot of feedback on that picture...not sure why...
...have time for a phone call this week?
..and, while I am vehemently opposed to any bailouts, if you are going to give, give to those who are innovating as well, no?
..I dont know if Tesla has a "hand out", but the idea of viability in that article makes me think that they can't access the money..
..I need to learn about blogtalkradio....and thank @digiphile for putting us together....
...I know about talkshoe..and I've been to the site, registered, but not enjoying the experience...is it me? Any talkshoe folks?
...where are you?
...I need your email address...can you DM me, please....
...thank you....
...again, I do not disagree...when are we getting together for coffee? Soon, I hope....
...it's not longer to give the nomination to the guy who "earned" it...it needs to go to the person who can win...
..thus their problem...the GOP needs a new voice..and one that can actually speak clearly, powerfully and effectively...
..and wait till we see the other players, Cantor (R-VA), Pence (R-IN) and who knows who else...we don't know who's going to run...
...yes...for being in the spotlight, raising money..yes, yes, yes...for us to decide who is going to be the nominee, too early...
...yes, you have a battle ahead of you...you should be talking to @joshpaul about some of this as well...we can help...
...and we need to win the local, state and house elections in 2010...and win big....
...nice with the follow!
...thanks....I appreciate you taking the time to read it...
...if the take the money later, then I will add another note...but for now, good for Ford for not taking the cash...
...that is a sizeable number...
...I do not think Congress should be involved in college football...the idea is crazy...
...was supposed to be December, but sometimes you have to wait....
good for Ford for not taking bailout dollars...I hope they make it work...I am buying in Feb/March...will do what I can to help
...I am glad you still have a job...which shows, and what percentage of the NPR workforce is 64?
...what? The BCS is already so messed up, I thought Congress was already in charge...
..are the layoff rumors true? http://tinyurl.com/672bba ...are you one of them?
...site updated... http://www.tonykatz.com/?p=131 ...thanks....
..you are right...thanks for that info...I will update the site...also, I will take a longer look at them for my next car purchase
...excellent! and I am well worth it..I'll talk with you, if only to see you in those reindeer antlers...
...you need to follow me.. @tonykatz ...do it now...you'll feel better in the morning...
oh..I dont know if he will..that's why we need the investigation to continue..I'm curious what Blago will say when cutting a deal
...huh?
...pretty sure it means Stalin...we're talking about true communists here...as opposed to hedging your socialist bets....
...really? Who was it, and what did you do to them that forced the block?
..I'd have to go back and find them..but I will gladly point it out when I observe it next....
..for the record, I love to roast marshmallows..anyone in LA ever wants to roast, just DM me...plenty of room around the fire...
..aside from thinking that coconut ruins a good cup of cocoa..a warm cup and a cozy fire sounds really good..and marshmallows....
...sorry for my ignorance, but what is Whittards?
...pretty sure it's sarcasm, but I put nothing past the fairness folks...
...let's connect next week...shoot me a DM to let me know when you are available...
..yes...I understand...
...HA! RT:MarkUrbin @tonykatz Expect a motion to get Twitter covered by the so-called "Fairness Doctorine" ...#TCOT
..I am noticing many on the left who are bothered by #TCOT..did they think we wouldn't start using the tools en massse?
...someone who disagrees by making their factual case is fine by me, it's the vitriolic rhetoric that is problematic...
...you have a booking agent? How awesome is that!
...what do you need? #TCOT send a DM if you can...
...but the Constitution allows for it to happen...and Ohio makes 33...1 more state, based on research from @joshpaul, and this happens
..#FORD wants to have access to a line of credit if needed...which I am not ok with...but, until they ask, I will not berate them
...yes...however, I am very skeptical of the bailout/loan differential...from what I know, #FORD is not taking any money...
...glad to hear...I posted disclaimers to one of my blog posts when I saw that #FORD is not taking the cash..#TCOT
...I'll give you a call tomorrow...we will discuss....
...I need a much more detailed explanation of the part of the call I missed...
...that is some freaky kink....
...thanks...I appreciate it....
...TCOT RADIO is every Tuesday at 1pm PST...having some problems with @blogtalkradio right now...so, I'll know for sure soon.
...nice to know I'm not the only one who is awake....
...explain further, please....
..and that is what the election for RNC chair is all about...who will really lead the party out of the neo-con swamp?...#TCOT
...it is interesting to be lectured to by the left on "embracing America"...I know you didn't write the post...
..the GOP needs to remove the neo-con element if it wants to be conservative and win elections...
...that is the sole problem..left wants to combine conservatives and GOP..just not the case...but they keep trying and trying...
just read http://tinyurl.com/57kqt8 ...I'm amazed how little you understand conservatives..#TCOT..article is rife with flaws
...just an update...no shortribs last night...pushing to Tuesday...looking forward to it...
..no...still getting an error....
..not looking at her being defeatable, looking at her being the wrong choice and pure pandering hackery...#tcot
...you mean, aside from her last name? #tcot
I know..I should be or social worker or work for the community..maybe I can make $316K/year for U of Chicago hospital #tcot
if I pay tax rates they'd like me to pay, I deprive ME of the funding to do all the things I do to improve my life #tcot
...agreed...
..scary? speak for yourself...my goatee makes me look freakin sweet!
..you can talk about it on Tuesday at 1pm PST, and it will be a major topic of the show - http://tcotradio.blogspot.com ..#tcot
..I should bring it up on the next #TCOT Radio show...it would be good to hear everyone on this subject....
..it's beyond me, and beyond anyone who is thinking at all...Pres. Bush is simply wrong, and it is shameful...#tcot
..happy to help if you need anything or have questions...just ask or DM (Direct Message) me...have a great day....
..have you contacted @michaelpleahy and are you a part of #tcot?
..and I'd love to know what films you are working on these days...Merry Christmas....
brashals=sirloin-sliced thin, salt and pepper, garlic, and romano cheese wrapped around a hard boiled egg and pan fried, right?
...hoping you got my DM's regarding our call at 3pm...
...perhaps we can work something out....
now following everyone on #TCOT ....hope to hear from all of you soon....
it's crazy...I have a stalker? if I don't find out who it is in the next 24 hours, I am posting the phone number and everyone can call....
ok...the crazy threats continue...now against my business...leaves text messages..when I call, he won't tell me his name...
RT @palinsupporter Fox: Govt. contemplating 4.5% loans to new home buyers or people who want to refinance their home. Might cost $1 Trillion
watching this week's HOUSE...and they just quoted Monty Python and the Holy Grail...that's what you get when you cast BlackAdder guys...
adding more great people from #TCOT ...look forward to the follow back and the great things that come next....
ok...it works...bring on the celebration...
I will try this test one more time...
testing an application...let's see how it works...
need a mentor or be a mentor for #TCOT? http://tinyurl.com/5kxe79 ...great idea!!
trying to keep up with all the great DM's of new followers....I will get to everyone, I hope..thanks for being here...
good for the people of Louisiana who got rid of a corrupt politician...welcome Anh "Joseph" Cao, and congrats on your win #TCOT
#TCOT a trending topic on Summize...great job, everyone....
watching the Bucs get run over...literally....I guess that's why there's next week....
don't expect bailout money for Tesla... http://www.reuters.com/article/americasDealsNews/idUSTRE4B77L920081208 ..what do you think?
can anyone suggest a good service or program for doing a podcast with live call-ins? had some suggestions, but could use more...
.....land shark.....
an unbelievable story.. http://tinyurl.com/6zo9xm ...I will be thinking of him and his family..how lucky we all are...
my response to Stephen Sexton on Rebuild the Party.. http://rebuildtheparty.ning.com/profile/StephenSexton #TCOT...we are doing great things

just looked out the window at Starbucks, and could have sworn Matisyahu was sitting there...crazy....
it comes from the general assembly of Ohio.. http://tinyurl.com/5c5cjq ..anyone? #TCOT
ok..#TCOT and all politically minded people http://tinyurl.com/6y3r37 ..can you fill me on the idea of calling a Constitutional Convention?
talking with @mosqueda....realizing that I have been nominated for an interesting duty #TCOT
thanks to all of those who called in to @tcotradio ..first show was a success..can't wait to do more.. http://tcotradio.blogspot.com ..#TCOT
we are less than 10 minutes from TCOT RADIO!!! Join us... http://tcotradio.blogspot.com ...follow on @tcotradio
30 minutes to TCOT Radio... http://tcotradio.blogspot.com ...call in/tweet in/join in.....

so, can we all agree that making Caroline Kennedy the next Senator from NY is a bad idea? #tcot....and anyone else who'd like to comment...
funny, I want tax exempt shopping days everyday...#tcot...
retailers want tax exempt shopping days.. http://online.wsj.com/article/SB123007573825931553.html ...#tcot
way to go #tcot!!!!! Pardon Ramos and Compean! http://tcotreport.com/ great job keeping this story front and center, and shame on Pres Bush
yesterday, it was anisette cookies...today, lasagna and broccoli rabe...my nose is the happiest nose in all the land....
